def generateAirship(newmap): width = 32 height = 48
newmap.resize(width, height)
cx = int(width/2) cy = int(height/2)
# make ship outline for y in range(height): dx = width/height * math.sqrt((height/4+width/4)**2-(y-height/2)**2*width/height) x1 = int(cx + dx) x2 = int(cx - dx) debug('COORD: {0}'.format((x2, y))) try: newmap.putOn(x1, y, 'ground', Entity({'class':'wall'})) newmap.putOn(x2, y, 'ground', Entity({'class':'wall'})) except TiledMapSizeError: warning('can\'t place!')
#action('map-fill-area', {'position':'ground', 'fill':'floor', 'limit':'wall', 'x':cx, 'y':cy}) newmap.setAttr('centre', (cx, cy)) newmap.setExist(True)
info('new airship')
return True
